thread.title: Youtuber pranks boyfriend with fake blood and he faints
thread.title_full: Youtuber pranks boyfriend with fake blood and he faints

title: Youtuber pranks boyfriend with fake blood and he faints
text: Share 25 shares When her boyfriend arrives back from the shops he hurries towards her but stops dead at the sight of the blood and puts his hand to his mouth in horror. 'How did you do that?' he stammers, holding onto the nearest surface and looking distinctly queasy. 'I'm literally going to make it so bad,' she says, liberally splattering the red stuff on her palms and a kitchen knife, 'that's two tubes of blood!' Rebekah can't help but laugh throughout at the ingenuity of her mischievous plan But as Rebekah continues her amateur dramatics, Reuben appears to lose consciousness altogether and keels over onto the floor. 'Babe!' she cries, going over to him and attempting to revive him, 'Babe, it was just a joke!' However, when he comes round he fails to see the funny side and hauls himself up the floor, much subdued. When her boyfriend arrives back from the shops he hurries towards her but stops dead at the sight of the blood and puts his hand to his mouth in horror 'How did you do that?' he stammers, holding onto the nearest surface and looking distinctly queasy But as Rebekah continues her amateur dramatics, Reuben appears to lose consciousness altogether and keels over onto the floor 'Babe!' she cries, going over to him and attempting to revive him, 'Babe, it was just a joke!' 'As long as you're OK,' he murmurs, as she continues to laugh at the prank. The funny video has since been viewed 715,000 times on Facebook where the couple regularly post the pranks they play on each other. Share or comment on this article 25
